00045 // Read 1-based probe #s from file into probeSet, converting to 0-based
00046 // JHG: NOTE: size_t changes size from host to host. fix its size at uint32_t so
00047 // it doesnt break TsvFile with the template.
00048 // void readProbeSetFromFile(std::vector<size_t> *probeSet, const char *probesetFilename);
00049 void readProbeSetFromFile(std::vector<uint32_t> *probeSet, const char *probesetFilename);
00050 
00051 void readQuantilesFromFile(std::vector<double> *quantiles, const char *quantilesFilename);
00052 
00053 void readCelFilesFromFile(std::vector<std::string> *celfiles, const char *celfilesFilename);
00054 
00055 template<class T>
00056 void readSingleColumnFile(std::vector<T> *outputVec, const std::string& filename, const std::string& columnName)
00057 {
00058     outputVec->clear();
00059     affx::TsvFile tsv;
00060     if (columnName == "") {
00061         tsv.m_optHasColumnHeader = false;
00062         tsv.m_optAutoColumns = true;
00063     }
00064     if(tsv.open(filename) != affx::TSV_OK) {
00065       throw BroadException("Error opening file", __FILE__, __LINE__, filename.c_str(), errno);
00066     }
00067     T val;
00068     if (columnName != "") {
00069         tsv.bind(0, columnName, &val, affx::TSV_BIND_REQUIRED);
00070     }
00071     while(tsv.nextLevel(0) == affx::TSV_OK) {
00072         if (columnName == "") {
00073             tsv.get(0, 0, val);
00074         }
00075         outputVec->push_back(val);
00076     }
00077     tsv.close();
00078 }
00079
